eu.liveGov.libraries.livegovtoolkit.location
Class LocationService

java.lang.Object
  eu.liveGov.libraries.livegovtoolkit.location.LocationService
All Implemented Interfaces:
LocationListener
public class LocationService
extends Object
implements LocationListener

Check if location providers are enabled. Store the location from AR fragment for general use.

Author:
Dimitrios Ververidis for the Multimedia Group (http://mklab.iti.gr).
